page.title: 15Education
page.content: Leintwardine Primary school was opened in 1973. It has 79 pupils in it and 4 classes but only 3 of them are being used. It is a small village school. There are 22 pupils in the bottom class. The next classroom is empty The next class has 27 pupils and the top class has 30 pupils. The old school was opened in 1845 and closed in 1973. It has been converted into a community centre and also houses the village library. Hightree Nurseries is called Hightree because its got high trees round it.It used to be a boarding school and a day school. Its a very big house with big gardens and its just been sold as flats. It used to have 2 classes. The old school in World War 2 was used as a private school. It had 3 classrooms and 1 woodwork room. It was a day school providing good education.
